name: Walking on Starlight
description:
For the weekly game jam 135, on the theme  of "shooting stars", I made this little game about an astronaut falling and using shooting stars to propel himself upward (this doesn't aim to be realistic).

The goal of the game is to remain on screen as long as possible by using the stars as stepping stones. If you get the timing right (warning, you need to press UP a bit earlier than the collision), you'll get propelled even further up.
